Examination.leaderboardExplanation: Scores are calculated based on your performance across all examinations, taking into account difficulty level, accuracy, and completion time.
Examination.pleaseRefreshOrTryAgainLater: Please refresh or try again later
Examination.doNotNavigateAwayMessage: Please do not navigate away during a test. If you need to leave, use the Cancel button to properly exit your exam.
Examination.startExamDescription: Take a new examination to test your knowledge and improve your skills.
Examination.viewStatsDescription: View your detailed performance statistics and progress.
Examination.leaderboardDescription: See how you rank against other students.
Examination.tip1: Read all questions carefully before answering.
Examination.tip2: Manage your time - don't spend too long on any one question.
Examination.tip3: Review your answers before submitting if time allows.
